ie.dcu.cngl.summarizer

Class Weighter

  • java.lang.Object
    • ie.dcu.cngl.summarizer.Weighter
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    IWeighter

    public class Weighter
extends java.lang.Object
implements IWeighter
    A Weighter executes all summarization features chosen. Several features are provided by default.
    Author:
    Shane
